DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate efficacy safety tralokinumab adult atopic dermatitis
DOC.brief_title: Phase 2 Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety Tralokinumab Adults With Atopic Dermatitis
DOC.criteria: Physician diagnosis atopic dermatitis > 1 year Atopic dermatitis involvement ≥ 10 % body surface area EASI score ≥ 12 SCORAD ≥ 25 IGA score ≥ 3 Effective birth control line protocol detail History anaphylaxis follow biologic therapy Hepatitis B , C HIV Pregnant breastfeed History cancer Previous receipt tralokinumab
